summary:
KEVAT-PAY BLOCKCHAIN - Blockchain for Fastest Networking Solution & Payments

 About Us - KevatPay is a decentralized blockchain that will be used for the fastest networking solutions & secure transaction system.

 Why The Push Toward Decentralization? - Decentralized systems powered by the blockchain are the next logical step in the evolution of the internet.

 The Role Of Mining In Powering A Decentralized World - Mining is the process which powers the decentralized blockchain.

 KevatPay Security concept - KevatPay Blockchain technology system is more secure than cloud computing.
